lexUnit.name: yelp.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: utter a yelp or yelps.

sentence.text: She flung herself on Wexford , yelping frenetically , and when he pushed her away , ran round him in circles , wildly gyrating her tail and flapping her knitted ears .
K!sdra yelped involuntarily as the tip of the sword pricked a bead of blood from his adam 's apple .
A searching , frantic hand savagely grasped Maggie 's hip , and she yelped as sharp nails pierced her skin .
It was Magnus who discovered the girl first ; he yelped unsteadily , his voice rising with excitement , and Gina went to see what he had found .
The wolves yelped uncontrollably , throwing their riders into the mess before scampering off back to the hills their tails tucked firmly between their legs .
He yelped shrilly and dropped his guard just sufficiently for a sword , swung by a surprised opponent , to skewer him .
Her heart flew to her mouth as she yelped and turned tail .
Then , all of a sudden , there was a sort of bang and the dog started yelping and I thought he must have fallen or something and that he might be hurt .
It could be threatening to the group or at least bad manners for a lion or a wolf or a hyena to yelp and limp on twisting an ankle during a communal stalk .
She yelped and squealed , working her voice to a crescendo as she bawled at the top of her voice .
Steve yelped and Newman grabbed the gun he was holding .
My dogs were straining against the sledge now and yelping as if badly hurt .
Next morning , she yawned , wakened , saw his beard , and yelped in alarm before she remembered where she was .
At the far end of the table Nadirpur almost yelped in anguish .
Farrar yelped at the sound of grinding bones , and looked around in dazed fury .
Cranston turned and quietly cursed as the madman scampered across the snow to greet them , yelping like an affectionate dog .
Her foot connected hard with Benton 's right shin and he yelped in pain , reaching down to massage the throbbing limb .
Despite herself , Piper yelped with surprise .
The boy withdrew , yelping with frustration , then turned and threw himself again , like a dog , going for Tuan 's throat .
Some whooped and yelped like savages , others lounged in corners staring wistfully at toys they could never afford .
She burnt her ear , and yelped .
Her teeth sank into the hand at her mouth and the man yelped , staggering away .
